HotelElement.Name: City Edge Serviced Apartments East Melbourne

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at City Edge Serviced Apartments East Melbourne in East Melbourne, you'll be in the historical district and convenient to Fitzroy Gardens and Melbourne Cricket Ground. This family-friendly aparthotel is within close proximity of National Sports Museum and St Patrick's Cathedral.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 72 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. LCD televisions are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include separate sitting areas and microwaves, and housekeeping is provided weekly.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Continental breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Extended parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Continental breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Fitzroy Gardens - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
National Sports Museum - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
St Patrick's Cathedral - 1 km / 0.6 mi

Melbourne Museum - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Rod Laver Arena - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Birrarung Marr Park - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Carlton Gardens - 1.5 km / 1 mi

The preferred airport for City Edge Serviced Apartments East Melbourne is Melbourne, VIC (MEL-Tullamarine) - 19.9 km / 12.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
